question: Who has been honoured with the 28th Vyas Samman for year 2018?
explanation: In New Delhi , the well known Hindi writer Leeladhar Jagoori has been honoured with the prestigious  28th Vyas Samman for the year 2018 for his poetry collection- ‘Jitne Log Utne Prem’.  Since 1991, the Vyas Samman is given by K K Birla Foundation for an outstanding literary work in Hindi authored by an Indian citizen published during the last 10 years. It carries award money of 4 lakh rupees along with a citation and plaque.
